# Brigmedic SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#ba292c][bold]Brigmedic[/bold][/color] of this station.
For the purposes of Alert Escalation: Treat higher alerts as if they are still on the previous alert level. (Yellow Alert is Blue Alert if it was Blue Alert prior.) Furthermore, treat Delta, Gamma, Epsilon, and Violet Alert as Red Alert.
## Green Alert 1. Brigmedic must provide emergency medical care to prisoners, and most importantly, Security personnel.
2. Brigmedic is not allowed to conduct arrests, searches or any other Security procedures.
3. Brigmedic is to stay at Security department and help the Warden. Exception is made if a Security member is down and requires rescue.
4. Brigmedic is only permitted to carry a standard disabler, and a combat knife (which should be in their jackboots) and use them exclusively for self-defense.
## Blue Alert 1. Guidelines 1 and 2 are carried over from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color].
2. Brigmedic is allowed to leave the department to provide urgent medical care to other Security members at the frontline.
3. Brigmedic is permitted to carry a standard MK58 pistol along with their [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color] gear with the Warden's or Head of Security's approval, but also exclusively for self-defense.
## Red Alert 1. Guidelines 1 are carried over from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color].
2. Brigmedic is given the same authority and rights as Security Officers with the Head of Security's approval, but they should still prioritize the healing.
